snippet:
pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_snoc(s: Seq<i32>, lo: int, hi: int)
        requires
            0 <= lo,
            lo < hi,
            hi <= s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi) == spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi - 1) + s[hi - 1] as int,
        decreases hi - lo,

pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_single(s: Seq<i32>, i: int)
        requires
            0 <= i < s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, i, i + 1) == s[i] as int,

pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_empty(s: Seq<i32>, lo: int, hi: int)
        requires lo >= hi,
        ensures spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi) == 0,

pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_split(s: Seq<i32>, lo: int, mid: int, hi: int)
        requires
            0 <= lo <= mid <= hi <= s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi) == spec_range_sum(s, lo, mid) + spec_range_sum(s, mid, hi),
        decreases mid - lo,

pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_via_prefix(s: Seq<i32>, lo: int, hi: int)
        requires
            0 <= lo <= hi <= s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi) == spec_prefix_sum(s, hi) - spec_prefix_sum(s, lo),

pub proof fn lemma_min_prefix_sum_is_min(s: Seq<i32>, k: int, j: int)
        requires
            0 <= j <= k,
        ensures
            spec_min_prefix_sum(s, k) <= spec_prefix_sum(s, j),
        decreases k,

pub proof fn lemma_min_prefix_sum_achieved(s: Seq<i32>, k: int)
        requires k >= 0,
        ensures
            exists|j: int| #![trigger spec_prefix_sum(s, j)]
                0 <= j <= k && spec_prefix_sum(s, j) == spec_min_prefix_sum(s, k),
        decreases k,

pub proof fn lemma_range_sum_subseq(full: Seq<i32>, sub: Seq<i32>, offset: int, lo: int, hi: int)
        requires
            0 <= offset,
            0 <= lo <= hi <= sub.len(),
            offset + hi <= full.len(),
            forall|i: int| #![trigger sub[i]] 0 <= i < sub.len() ==> sub[i] == full[offset + i],
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(sub, lo, hi) == spec_range_sum(full, offset + lo, offset + hi),
        decreases hi - lo,

pub proof fn lemma_crossing_decompose(s: Seq<i32>, lo: int, mid: int, hi: int)
        requires
            0 <= lo < mid < hi <= s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, lo, hi) == spec_range_sum(s, lo, mid) + spec_range_sum(s, mid, hi),

pub proof fn lemma_sums_fit_subseq(full: Seq<i32>, sub: Seq<i32>, offset: int)
        requires
            sums_fit_i32(full),
            0 <= offset,
            offset + sub.len() <= full.len(),
            forall|i: int| #![trigger sub[i]] 0 <= i < sub.len() ==> sub[i] == full[offset + i],
        ensures
            sums_fit_i32(sub),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_brute(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_contig_sub_sum_divcon_mt(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
                obeys_feq_clone::<i32>(),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_divcon_opt_mt(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
                obeys_feq_clone::<i32>(),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_aux(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: StrengthResult)
        requires a.seq@.len() > 0, sums_fit_i32(a.seq@), obeys_feq_clone::<i32>(),
        ensures
            mcss.0.is_some(),
            is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.0.unwrap() as int),
            is_max_prefix_sum(a.seq@, mcss.1 as int),
            is_max_suffix_sum(a.seq@, mcss.2 as int),
            mcss.3 as int == spec_range_sum(a.seq@, 0, a.seq@.len() as int),
        decreases a.seq@.len(),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_divcon_opt(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_aux(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: StrengthResult)
        requires
            a.seq@.len() > 0,
            sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
        ensures
            mcss.0.is_some(),
            is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.0.unwrap() as int),
            is_max_prefix_sum(a.seq@, mcss.1 as int),
            is_max_suffix_sum(a.seq@, mcss.2 as int),
            mcss.3 as int == spec_range_sum(a.seq@, 0, a.seq@.len() as int),
        decreases a.seq@.len(),

pub proof fn lemma_divcon_combine(
        s: Seq<i32>,
        left: Seq<i32>,
        right: Seq<i32>,
        mid: int,
        m_left: int,
        m_right: int,
        s_left: int,
        p_right: int,
    )
        requires
            s.len() > 1,
            0 < mid < s.len() as int,
            left.len() == mid,
            right.len() == s.len() - mid,
            forall|i: int| #![trigger left[i]] 0 <= i < left.len() ==> left[i] == s[i],
            forall|i: int| #![trigger right[i]] 0 <= i < right.len() ==> right[i] == s[mid + i],
            is_mcss_of(left, m_left),
            is_mcss_of(right, m_right),
            is_max_suffix_sum(left, s_left),
            is_max_prefix_sum(right, p_right),
        ensures
            is_mcss_of(s, ({
                let crossing = s_left + p_right;
                if m_left >= m_right && m_left >= crossing { m_left }
                else if m_right >= crossing { m_right }
                else { crossing }
            })),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_divcon(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_suffix_sum(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mss: i32)
        requires
            a.seq@.len() > 0,
            sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
        ensures
            is_max_suffix_sum(a.seq@, mss as int),

fn max_prefix_sum(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mps: i32)
        requires
            a.seq@.len() > 0,
            sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
        ensures
            is_max_prefix_sum(a.seq@, mps as int),

proof fn lemma_max_ending_at_is_max(s: Seq<i32>, j: int, lo: int)
        requires
            0 <= lo <= j,
            j < s.len(),
        ensures
            spec_range_sum(s, lo, j + 1) <= spec_max_ending_at(s, j),
        decreases j,

proof fn lemma_max_ending_at_achieved(s: Seq<i32>, j: int)
        requires
            0 <= j < s.len(),
        ensures
            exists|lo: int|
                #![trigger spec_range_sum(s, lo, j + 1)]
                0 <= lo <= j && spec_range_sum(s, lo, j + 1) == spec_max_ending_at(s, j),
        decreases j,

fn max_contig_sub_sum_iter(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_opt_mt(a: &ArraySeqMtEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
                a.seq@.len() < usize::MAX,
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

pub proof fn lemma_prefix_opt_is_mcss(s: Seq<i32>, m: int, n: int)
        requires
            n == s.len(),
            n > 0,
            sums_fit_i32(s),
            // m is achieved by some hi
            exists|hi: int|
                #![trigger spec_prefix_sum(s, hi)]
                1 <= hi <= n &&
                m == spec_prefix_sum(s, hi) - spec_min_prefix_sum(s, hi - 1),
            // m is maximal over all hi
            forall|hi: int|
                #![trigger spec_prefix_sum(s, hi)]
                1 <= hi <= n ==>
                m >= spec_prefix_sum(s, hi) - spec_min_prefix_sum(s, hi - 1),
        ensures
            is_mcss_of(s, m),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_opt(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
                a.seq@.len() < usize::MAX,
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_contig_sub_sum_reduced_mcsse(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),

fn max_contig_sub_sum_reduced(a: &ArraySeqStEphS<i32>) -> (mcss: Option<i32>)
            requires
                sums_fit_i32(a.seq@),
            ensures
                a.seq@.len() == 0 ==> mcss.is_none(),
                a.seq@.len() > 0 ==> mcss.is_some(),
                mcss.is_some() ==> is_mcss_of(a.seq@, mcss.unwrap() as int);

fn max_with_neginf(a: Option<i32>, b: Option<i32>) -> (max: Option<i32>)
        ensures max == spec_max_opt_i32(a, b),
